alert.note: Alert for Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 10 at 4:31PM EST until March 12 at 3:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM EST SATURDAY TO 4 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM EST Saturday to 4 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. GREAT SOUTH BAY AT LINDENHURST NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.1 FT, MODERATE 3.6 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 11/12 AM 2.7/ 3.2 1.1/ 1.6 1.4/ 1.9 0-1 NONE 11/12 PM 2.4/ 3.0 0.9/ 1.4 1.3/ 1.8 1 MINOR 12/01 AM 3.2/ 3.7 1.7/ 2.2 2.0/ 2.5 0 MINOR 12/02 PM 2.7/ 3.2 1.2/ 1.7 1.7/ 2.2 0 NONE GREAT SOUTH BAY AT WEST SAYVILLE NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
